005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.UriReferenceItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import java.net.URI;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * An atomic Metapath item containing a URI reference data value that complies
020 * with RFC2396. URI references can be absolute URIs, relative URIs, or
021 * same-document references.
022 *
023 * @see java.net.URI
024 * @see <a href="https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2396.txt">RFC2396</a>
025 */
026public interface IUriReferenceItem extends IAnyUriItem {
027  /**
028   * Get the type information for this item.
029   *
030   * @return the type information
031   */
032  @NonNull
033  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IUriReferenceItem> type() {
034    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.URI_REFERENCE.getItemType();
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IUriReferenceItem> getType() {
039    return type();
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Construct a new URI item using the provided string {@code value}.
044   *
045   * @param value
046   *          a string representing a URI
047   * @return the new item
048   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
049   *           if the given string violates RFC2396
050   */
051  @NonNull
052  static IUriReferenceItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
053    try {
054      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.URI_REFERENCE.parse(value));
055    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
056      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
057          null,
058          String.format("Invalid URI reference value '%s'. %s",
059              value,
060              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
061          ex);
062    }
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Construct a new item using the provided URI {@code value}.
067   *
068   * @param value
069   *          a string representing a URI
070   * @return the new item as a {@link IUriReferenceItem}
071   */
072  @NonNull
073  static IUriReferenceItem valueOf(@NonNull URI value) {
074    return new UriReferenceItemImpl(value);
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
079   *
080   * @param item
081   *          the item to cast
082   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
083   *         cast to this type
084   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
085   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
086   */
087  @NonNull
088  static IUriReferenceItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
089    try {
090      return item instanceof IUriReferenceItem
091          ? (IUriReferenceItem) item
092          : item instanceof IAnyUriItem
093              ? valueOf(((IAnyUriItem) item).asUri())
094              : valueOf(item.asString());
095    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
096      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
097      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
098    }
099  }
100
101  @Override
102  default IUriReferenceItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
103    return cast(item);
104  }
105}
